session.goal: Create Planning page for Daily Progress Tracker

changes_summary: Created new PlanningPage.tsx with daily and weekly planning modes, calendar integration, task lists, and focus blocks
decisions_made: Auto-detects Monday for weekly planning mode, with manual toggle between daily/weekly
Daily mode shows: today's date, active tasks grouped by priority, calendar summary (meeting count, free hours, % booked), and focus blocks computed from free time slots

Weekly mode shows: week range, last 7 days stats (completed tasks + active streaks), 3 weekly goals (persisted to localStorage by week number), week-ahead calendar breakdown (meetings + free hours per day)
Followed existing patterns: useDatabase + useRxQuery hooks, glass-card styling, dynamic calendar import for code-splitting
Reused calendar-monitor and calendar-ai services for meeting load stats and free slot computation
Priority badge styling matches existing task priority color system (urgent=red, high=orange, medium=yellow, low=slate)
Calendar connection detection with fallback UI prompts user to connect Google Calendar if not connected
TypeScript compilation verified successfully with no errors

continuation.next_immediate_step: Add PlanningPage to router configuration and navigation menu
next_three_steps: Add route for /planning in App.tsx or router config
Add Planning menu item to sidebar navigation
Test calendar integration and localStorage persistence of weekly goals
